level.text: If a player validates a winning RACE2RICHES® ticket and a portion of the RACE2RICHES® ticket has draw(s) remaining, a RACE2RICHES® Exchange Ticket will be reissued to the player at no additional cost. A RACE2RICHES®

Exchange Ticket shall contain the exact RACE2RICHES® Game Play and future drawing date(s) appearing on the validated RACE2RICHES® ticket it is replacing and shall have all other characteristics of a RACE2RICHES® ticket except as otherwise stated in these rules. An Exchange Ticket shall not contain a Ticket price.
RACE2RICHES® Exchange Tickets are valid beginning with the next draw through the last draw on the original RACE2RICHES® Ticket.
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 10832, 10910 (November 19, 2010).
